member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridExcelExportExtension.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions)
member.summary: This method exports the dataGrid to excel by considering Grouping,Sorting,Filtering,Summaries,Paging,NestedGrid,CellTypes.
member.param: Class which is used to set the Exporting Options

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridExcelExportExtension.SetIndentColumnWidth(Syncfusion.XlsIO.IWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ColumnWidth for the specified cells as 20.
member.param: Start: Specifies the start indent column index
end : Specifies the End column index of indent cells

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridExcelExportExtension.SetColumnWidth(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.XlsIO.IWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the column width from Grid To Excel for all columns starting from specified column index.
member.param: ColumnIndex: Specifies the First Column index

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridExcelExportExtension.ExportCellValueToExcel(Syncfusion.XlsIO.IRange,Syncfusion.Data.IPropertyAccessProvider,System.Object,System.Object,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.GridColumn)
member.summary: Exports the cell value from datagrid to excel.
member.param: IRange - to which the cellvalue is to be exported.
PropertyAccessProvider is to get the value
Object which holds the value that is exported to excel

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions
member.summary: Class which is used to set the ExportingOptions. user can pass this class as an argument to the ExportToExcelMethod.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.AllowOutlining
member.summary: Specifies whether the groups should export with expand/collapse options or not. There is no indent space maintained if AllowOutlining is set to true. If the grid contains the Details View definition, the AllowOutlining is set to true internally.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.CellsExportingEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate handler which is used to handle or customize the exporting of a particular cell in Excel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ChildExportingEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate handler which is used to customize the exporting of Details View.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExcelVersion
member.summary: Exports data to Excel in the specificed workbook version

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportAllPages
member.summary: Specifies whether the method should export all pages for PagedCollection. By default, it exports the first page only. This option is not supported with OnDemandPaging.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportingEventHandler
member.summary: Delegate handler which is used to customize the styles for Header, Table Summary, Group Summary and Caption Summary rows.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.StartColumnIndex
member.summary: Exports data to the specified column index in Excel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.StartRowIndex
member.summary: Exports data to to the specified row index in Excel

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportPageOptions
member.summary: Specifies how the paged collection to be exported into excel

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportMode
member.summary: Specifies how the data to be exported into excel

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportStackedHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets whether stacked headers can be exported or not

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportUnBoundRows
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the UnBoundRows can be exported or not

member.summary: Exports the FormattedText to Excel

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExportMode.Value
member.summary: Exports the Format into Excel by setting Excel number format.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExportPageOptions.ExportToSingleSheet
member.summary: Export paged collection to Single sheet

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExportPageOptions.ExportToDifferentSheets
member.summary: Export paged collection to different sheets based on page by page (For this case, Grouping can be considered).
